issue.title: Rendering errors when running headless on remote machine

content.raw: Copy that. BTW, since you mentioned issue ~~#135~~, please make sure you indicate that you can reproduce the issue in both environments \(on your Sarah’s local system and on the IT guy’s remote system\). The latter sometimes can add impediments \(e.g. security constraints / organization policies\) for the SubT Testbed to run.
